title: fanoutqa: What are the top five highest-grossing Christmas films at the box office, and what are their box office earnings in millions of dollars? (4a8a9ba7337a09d3)

chat_history.content: What are the top five highest-grossing Christmas films at the box office, and what are their box office earnings in millions of dollars?

chat_history.content: You shouldn't delegate the entire task to a helper. Handle it yourself, or if it's still too complex, try breaking it up into smaller steps and call this again.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Please provide me with the list of the top five highest-grossing Christmas films at the box office, and I will look up their box office earnings in millions of dollars."}

chat_history.content: You shouldn't delegate the entire task to a helper. Handle it yourself, or if it's still too complex, try breaking it up into smaller steps and call this again.
chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content: To find the top five highest-grossing Christmas films at the box office and their earnings in millions of dollars, I will first look up the list of the top five films and then find their respective box office earnings. Let's start by finding the top five highest-grossing Christmas films.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Please look up the list of the top five highest-grossing Christmas films at the box office."}

chat_history.content:
The top five highest-grossing Christmas films at the box office are:

1. *The Grinch* (2018) - $526,760,632
2. *Home Alone* (1990) - $476,684,675
3. *Alvin And The Chipmunks* (2007) - $365,352,546
4. *Home Alone 2: Lost in New York* (1992) - $358,994,850
5. *Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas!* (2000) - $345,823,032
chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content:
Here are the top five highest-grossing Christmas films at the box office along with their box office earnings in millions of dollars:

1. *The Grinch* (2018) - $526.76 million
2. *Home Alone* (1990) - $476.68 million
3. *Alvin And The Chipmunks* (2007) - $365.35 million
4. *Home Alone 2: Lost in New York* (1992) - $358.99 million
5. *Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas!* (2000) - $345.82 million

If you need more information or have any other questions, feel free to ask!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

chat_history.content: Please look up the list of the top five highest-grossing Christmas films at the box office.

<document>
<title>List of highest-grossing Christmas films</title>

The following is a page of the highest-grossing Christmas-themed films.

## Highest grossing Christmas film franchises[edit]




|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| ![[icon]](image) | This section **needs expansion**. You can help by adding to it. *(December 2019)*
 |


The following is a list of highest grossing Christmas film series and franchises. *Home Alone* tops the list with $914.8 million and also has the best average with $304.9 million.

## Biggest worldwide openings for Christmas films[edit]




|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| ![[icon]](image) | This section **needs expansion**. You can help by adding to it. *(December 2019)*
 |


This list charts the largest opens for Christmas films worldwide. Since Christmas films do not open on Fridays in many markets, the 'opening' is taken to be the gross between the first day of release and the first Sunday.


Figures are given in United States dollars (USD).


This list does not take into account country-by-country variations in release dates. Therefore, in some cases opening weekend grosses from many, or even most countries may not be included.





| Rank | Film | Worldwide opening | Year | Ref[38] |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | *The Grinch* | $67,752,855 | 2018 | [1] |
| 2 | *How the Grinch Stole Christmas* | $55,082,330 | 2000 | [39] |
| 3 | *Four Christmases* | $34,890,733 | 2008 | [40] |
| 4 | *Elf* | $31,113,501 | 2003 | [41] |
| 5 | *The Best Man Holiday* | $30,107,555 | 2013 | [42] |
| 6 | *A Christmas Carol* | $30,051,075 | 2009 | [43] |
| 7 | *The Santa Clause 2* | $29,008,696 | 2002 | [44] |
| 8 | *The Polar Express* | $24,341,868 | 2004 | [45] |
| 9 | *Christmas with the Kranks* | $22,596,569 | 2004 | [46] |
| 10 | *The Nutcracker and the Four Realms* | $20,352,491 | 2018 | [13] |
| 11 | *Arthur Christmas* | $15,442,585 | 2011 | [16] |

chat_history.name: search

chat_history.content:
The top five highest-grossing Christmas films at the box office are:

1. *The Grinch* (2018) - $526,760,632
2. *Home Alone* (1990) - $476,684,675
3. *Alvin And The Chipmunks* (2007) - $365,352,546
4. *Home Alone 2: Lost in New York* (1992) - $358,994,850
5. *Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas!* (2000) - $345,823,032

You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.
